tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    organizer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE rsvps (
    rsvp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    guest_name VARCHAR(255),
    rsvp_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rsvps (
    rsvp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT NOT NULL,
    attendee_id INT NOT NULL,
    rsvp_status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES attendees(attendee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_rsvps (
    event_id UUID,
    attendee_id UUID,
    rsvp_status VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (event_id, attendee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES event_details(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES attendee_details(attendee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rsvps (
    rsvp_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    attendee_id INT,
    rsvp_status VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT FK_event_id FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id),
    CONSTRAINT FK_attendee_id FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES attendees(attendee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE guests (
    guest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_id INT,
    guest_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    guest_relationship VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT FK_attendee_id FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES attendees(attendee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE comments (
    comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    attendee_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT FK_event_id FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id),
    CONSTRAINT FK_attendee_id FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES attendees(attendee_id)
);
